page.title: 18THE OLDEST RESIDENT
page.content: Mr. & Mrs.Kent are two of the oldest residents of the village.They were born in the village and have lived here all their lives.They both went to the village school but had to leave at the age of thirteen.Mrs.Kent had to go and work on a farm and Mr.Kent went to work at a bakers and earned 2/6d (12p) per week.All of this money was given to his parents,and he might be lucky to be given one old penny for him to spend himself.Both boys and girls went to school in petticoats.There was no transport in the village ,unless you were rich and could afford a horse and trap.There were no food shops either and to get any you had to walk into Rugeley,a distance of seven miles.
